messages.message: There was a problem while opening/reading the XML configuration file '%(path_to_xml)s'
There was a problem while opening/reading the file '%(path_to_file)s'
There was a problem while creating the directory '%(directory)s'
'%(xml_tag_name)s' tag is missing in the XML configuration file '%(path_to_xml)s'
The tag attribute '%(xml_tag_attr)s' cannot be empty in '%(path_to_xml)s'
The tag '%(xml_tag_name)s' cannot be empty in '%(path_to_xml)s'
Query context '%(xpath_query_context)s' is not defined in '%(path_to_xml)s'
There are no XPath queries defined for host '%(host)s'. URL '%(url)s' will be ignored
HTTP header '%(header)s' is missing for URL '%(url)s'
URL '%(url)s' has not been modified since last update. This URL will be ignored
